TEXT.English: [NEWLINE]Affirming, promoting, or characterized by belief in equal political, economic, social, and civil rights for all people.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE]Affirming, promoting, or characterized by belief in equal political, economic, social, and civil rights for all people.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE]Affirming, promoting, or characterized by belief in equal political, economic, social, and civil rights for all people.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE]Affirming, promoting, or characterized by belief in equal political, economic, social, and civil rights for all people.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE]Affirming, promoting, or characterized by belief in equal political, economic, social, and civil rights for all people.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE]Immigrants flock to the land of opportunity.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE]Immigrants flock to the land of opportunity.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE]Immigrants flock to the land of opportunity.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE]Immigrants flock to the land of opportunity.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE]Immigrants flock to the land of opportunity.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE]One who advocates maximizing individual rights and minimizing the role of the state.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE]One who advocates maximizing individual rights and minimizing the role of the state.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE]One who advocates maximizing individual rights and minimizing the role of the state.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE]One who advocates maximizing individual rights and minimizing the role of the state.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE]One who advocates maximizing individual rights and minimizing the role of the state.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE]A social and economic system based on the raising and herding of livestock.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE]A social and economic system based on the raising and herding of livestock.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE]A social and economic system based on the raising and herding of livestock.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE]A social and economic system based on the raising and herding of livestock.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE]A social and economic system based on the raising and herding of livestock.

TEXT.English: You can gain an unlimited amount of traits. Traits may still to be lost if they drop below their threshold, unless you enable Cannot Lose Traits game option.
TEXT.French: You can gain an unlimited amount of traits. Traits may still to be lost if they drop below their threshold, unless you enable Cannot Lose Traits game option.
TEXT.German: You can gain an unlimited amount of traits. Traits may still to be lost if they drop below their threshold, unless you enable Cannot Lose Traits game option.

TEXT.Spanish: You can gain an unlimited amount of traits. Traits may still to be lost if they drop below their threshold, unless you enable Cannot Lose Traits game option.

TEXT.English: All your traits are permanent, and new traits gained can never be lost.
TEXT.French: All your traits are permanent, and new traits gained can never be lost.
TEXT.German: All your traits are permanent, and new traits gained can never be lost.

TEXT.Spanish: All your traits are permanent, and new traits gained can never be lost.
